song.title: Life Moves Pretty Fast (Klangkost Mix)
song.info:
art // dtx : chiptune electro !
I've started a collabo project with dualtrax, a known chiptuner. Flashbacks galore!!! I used to do Pro Tracker and Fast Tracker II stuff way back in the ninties.
Don't snatch, grab and run :p This is our first collabo chune, enjoy and drop a comment, aight?? ^.^
Check the original tune here : www.youtube.com/watch?v=aDLiv6Ypju4
Released 2010-08-07
On Soundcloud: https://soundcloud.com/artfx/artfx-dualtrax-life-moves-pretty-fast-klangkost-mix
